channel.title: Help with server

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I need to add this in my item 1st click case but i cant find it this is the code case 952: //shovel(barrows) if(dhTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3554; teleportToY = 9717; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); sendMessage("You teleport to the dharoks tomb."); } else if(toragTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3567; teleportToY = 9686; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); } else if(vhTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3553; teleportToY = 9684; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); } else if(ahTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3553; teleportToY = 9701; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); } else if(guthTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3542; teleportToY = 9704; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); } else if(karilTomb() == true) { teleportToX = 3571; teleportToY = 9708; heightLevel = 3; frame99(2); } break;

Read full topic
